deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

addCollateral(MarginVault.Vault storage,.details: increase the collateral balance in a vault

params._amount: number of _collateralAsset being added to the user's vault
params._collateralAsset: address of the _collateralAsset being added to the user's vault
params._index: index of _collateralAsset in the user's vault.collateralAssets array

addLong(MarginVault.Vault storage,addres.details: increase the long oToken balance in a vault when an oToken is deposited

params._amount: number of _longOtoken the protocol is adding to the user's vault
params._index: index of _longOtoken in the user's vault.longOtokens array
params._longOtoken: address of the _longOtoken being added to the user's vault
params._vault: vault to add a long position to

addShort(MarginVault.Vault storage,addre.details: increase the short oToken balance in a vault when a new oToken is minted

params._amount: number of _shortOtoken being minted from the user's vault
params._index: index of _shortOtoken in the user's vault.shortOtokens array
params._shortOtoken: address of the _shortOtoken being minted from the user's vault
params._vault: vault to add or increase the short position in

removeCollateral(MarginVault.Vault stora.details: decrease the collateral balance in a vault

params._amount: number of _collateralAsset being removed from the user's vault
params._collateralAsset: address of the _collateralAsset being removed from the user's vault
params._index: index of _collateralAsset in the user's vault.collateralAssets array

removeLong(MarginVault.Vault storage,add.details: decrease the long oToken balance in a vault when an oToken is withdrawn

params._amount: number of _longOtoken the protocol is removing from the user's vault
params._index: index of _longOtoken in the user's vault.longOtokens array
params._longOtoken: address of the _longOtoken being removed from the user's vault
params._vault: vault to remove a long position from

removeShort(MarginVault.Vault storage,ad.details: decrease the short oToken balance in a vault when an oToken is burned

params._amount: number of _shortOtoken being reduced in the user's vault
params._index: index of _shortOtoken in the user's vault.shortOtokens array
params._shortOtoken: address of the _shortOtoken being reduced in the user's vault
params._vault: vault to decrease short position in

userdoc.notice: A library that provides the Controller with a Vault struct and the functions that manipulate vaults. Vaults describe discrete position combinations of long options, short options, and collateral assets that a user can have.
